path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - TankBattle Token - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Pausable Contract Can Be Abused For Malicious Purposes
findings.description: The contract's pausable functionality can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: A03.Insecure use of role-based access control mechanisms
Arbitrary Fee Changes by ADMIN_ROLE
findings.description: The TransferFee contract allows arbitrary fee changes by the ADMIN_ROLE at any time.

findings.title: Blacklist functions can be used to block legitimate accounts
BurnFrom Function Can Be Exploited to Drain Owner Balances
findings.description: The burnFrom function can be exploited to drain owner balances.
